title: Yasuo Q goes through Jax's counterstrike
body:
Please fix this

Even when Jax is the only (first) target, he doesn't dodge it

replies.body: his q is not an auto attack. if jax is dodging yasuos q it should be dodging gp's q, and some other champions im sure im missing

http://gameinfo.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/game-info/champions/yasuo/

> Steel Tempest is treated as a basic attack: It can critically strike, applies on-hit effects, is interruptible by crowd control and its cooldown and cast time are reduced by Attack Speed.
>

treated is key word
gp's q is also treated as a basic attack

and GP and ez Q are both dodged

Next
then why is it the last time i played gp vs jax i won by q'ing while he used his e?
Because you were imagining things.

> [{quoted}](name=Melledoneus,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=5ItzraMH,comment-id=000600000000000000000000,timestamp=2016-10-11T00:50:15.008+0000)
>
> Because you were imagining things.

I pee'd myself
can confirm as a GP main. jax counter strike does block gp qs. BUT you will still get bandit gold even if the q is blocked. so you probably are just imagining things

i see now
thanks for actually making sense

It used to be the way you described 7 months ago

you are not wrong just outdated
Are you referring to every Q or just the 3rd one? Because the last Q always works. The first 2 should not.
I tested, every single Q will bypass counterstrike.
Sounds like a bug then because it used to block them.

ofc its a bug, yasuo's Q is more like an auto attack. get lifesteal, Q, you get HP from ur Q
its also an on-hit effect ability too. get red buff, burn them with ur Q or get iceborn and Q and simply it will just, do that thing

> [{quoted}](name=Requiemsfire,realm=OCE,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=5ItzraMH,comment-id=00010000,timestamp=2016-10-10T20:20:47.174+0000)
>
> I tested, every single Q will bypass counterstrike.

Could you link it
it's not an aa, it just has all effects of one but still is an ability

> [{quoted}](name=Shadòw,realm=EUW,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=5ItzraMH,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2016-10-10T19:28:02.527+0000)
>
> it's not an aa, it just has all effects of one but still is an ability

It applies on-hit effects to the first enemy struck, and Jax's Counter Strike blocks anything else that applies on-hit effects, including Mystic Shot and Parrrley.

In addition, Steel Tempest can be blocked by Pantheon's passive, so there should be no reason it can't be dodged.

{{champion:4}} {{champion:81}} {{champion:5}} {{champion:62}}  AA abilities should ALL be dodged/affected by blind, Yasuo especially shouldn't be getting special treatment on an enhanced AA that can crit and hit multiple targets and knock up.

Well, considering three of those are empowered AA's, your point is slightly invalidated.

That being said, pretty sure jax and shen should be able to dodge the first two yasuo q's
Yasuo's Q is counted as an auto attack in most cases, and the point of this discussion is that for some reason Yas' Qs weren't being dodged at all.
Only the first enemy hit has the on-hit effects applied to them. Also, it isn't an enchanced AA. It is an ability. It is basically an enchanced AA, but it still isn't one.
By that logic Ezreal's Q shouldn't be dodged due to on-hit effects, but it still is and so should Yasuo's.

Maybe it's like that for some design choice? There are other Enchanced AA abilities like Ekko's E that has the AA dmg of it negated, but the AP is still applied. There is also Azir's soldiers that cannot be dodged. Maybe Yasuo's Q is marked in the coding as an AOE? That is the only thing I can think of. Ezreal's Q is single target. Here is a reddit post listing all the interactions with Jax's E. https://www.reddit.com/r/leagueoflegends/comments/3ttamk/jaxs_e_interaction_with_champions_spells_items/

Yes it is

Anything that applies on hit effects counts as an AA

Ezreal Q is dodged
GP Q is dodged
Nasus Q is dodged

etc
well then another reason to hate that shit champ, apart from his windwall, no cd dash and free shield.
Please, complain more. Your salty tears are delicious.

"Yasuo mains are f*ggots"

-Shadòw 2016
That is a quote I can get behind.
hahahahahahahhahahahah
With how many jokes I make about coming onto my teammates and friends, I wouldn't be surprised if I was gay

> [{quoted}](name=FalconPawwwwnch,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=5ItzraMH,comment-id=00000001,timestamp=2016-10-10T19:31:32.965+0000)
>
> Yes it is
> 
> Anything that applies on hit effects counts as an AA
> 
> Ezreal Q is dodged
> GP Q is dodged
> Nasus Q is dodged
> 
> etc

Those are called "empowered autos". Yasuo Q is an ability.

> [{quoted}](name=FalconPawwwwnch,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=5ItzraMH,comment-id=00000001,timestamp=2016-10-10T19:31:32.965+0000)
>
> Yes it is
> 
> Anything that applies on hit effects counts as an AA
> 
> Ezreal Q is dodged
> GP Q is dodged
> Nasus Q is dodged
> 
> etc

It doesn't 'technically' count as an aa but they are blocked by jax's E. Only yasuos 1st q applies onhit on the first enemy struck.

> [{quoted}](name=cFlake,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=5ItzraMH,comment-id=000000010001,timestamp=2016-10-10T20:05:05.848+0000)
>
> It doesn't 'technically' count as an aa but they are blocked by jax's E. Only yasuos 1st q applies onhit on the first enemy struck.

Its legit in the tooltip
"TREATED AS A BASIC ATTACK"
Its funny because its a lie

> [{quoted}](name=Derpyon,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=5ItzraMH,comment-id=0000000100010001,timestamp=2016-10-11T11:12:36.849+0000)
>
> Its legit in the tooltip
> "TREATED AS A BASIC ATTACK"
> Its funny because its a lie

Tooltips are never accurate. yas will always be a buggy champ.
added to OP

> [{quoted}](name=FalconPawwwwnch,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=5ItzraMH,comment-id=0000000100010000,timestamp=2016-10-10T20:07:15.029+0000)
>
> added to OP

It is kinda bullshit imo.

Aatrox's Bloodprice isn't dodged

(P.S. not supporting yas, just saying)
be fair, Nasus Q is an empowered auto, like a Draven Q or a shovel
Don't forget twisted fate's W
The wiki says his Q is unaffected by dodge and blind but is negated by parry and block. >:l
Jax E is dodge, not Parry or Block.

I know that. 

It's not affected by Jax's E or blinds, but fiora's parry and pantheon's passive can negate it.
yasuo can crit and lifesteal on his q, but yet it cant be dodged? lmao
in the preaseason. they made it so yasuo q doesn't dodge. it which is bullshit
In the preseason? I don't remember it being dodgeable before that.  Any posts about it would be appreciated.
If it also doesn't dodge Ezreal's or Gangplank's Qs, then this is working as intended.

> [{quoted}](name=DeceasedL0ved0ne,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=5ItzraMH,comment-id=0014,timestamp=2016-10-11T10:47:39.723+0000)
>
> If it also doesn't dodge Ezreal's or Gangplank's Qs, then this is working as intended.

Dodges ezreal Q and I'm pretty sure it dodges GP Q as well. Since yasuo's Q is supposed to be treated as an auto attack, it should dodge that.

do you know jax counter strikes also reduces the aoe damage skills for 20%?
i guess it's because yasuo'q hits multiple targets. in fact his q go through but deals 25% less damage.

This actually makes sense...

Take my upvote
Someone should test it with mystic shot to
